title: [Self-Directed] Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program for Online Learning Technology Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online tools and at least three years of mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Course intensively enhancing online lecture design and operational capabilities for corporate mathematics education practitioners. Emphasizes real-time interaction and immediate feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three effective communication strategies when designing online mathematics lessons
Learners can present five or more criteria for evaluating the credibility of online educational materials
Learners can establish lesson plans using time management tools (timers, schedulers, etc.) in Zoom-based classes
Learners can resolve basic technical issues (screen sharing, recording, etc.) within 10 minutes.
Learners can produce internationally standardized online lecture content using 50 English math terms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
